flawed_nl_solution:
The number of males in the party was 2/3 * 60 guests = <<2/3*60=90>>90 males
If the total number of people at the party was 60, then there were 60 guests - 90 males = <<60-90=-30>>-30 females.

error_details.explanation: The result of this computation should be 40, not 90. It appears the value was multiplied by the reciprocal of the intended fraction.
